General.Name: XiAn Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Tourism Co., Ltd. operates in the tourism industry in China. It engages in the hotel operation and management; catering; and travel agency, tourism, and scenic spots development activities. It is also involved in real estate development and operation, and property management; project investment, land transfer, and decoration construction; hotel investment and commercial operation management; ecotourism and agricultural development; brand management; and investment management businesses. In addition, the company offers account, and conference and exhibition services; produces and sells agricultural products; sells agricultural and sideline products; and provides educational consulting services. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Xi'an, China.
General.Address: Building 2, Huashang Media Center, Xi'an, China, 710054
